CHAT.comment: Dear uncle Paul how are you doing? I love you. I miss you. See you soon. Love , Chi.

Chi decides who to write; Mot isn't much help because she is constantly distractly by Bro; Sis tries to help keep Bro quiet but is not very successful; Bro's screaming makes it hard to hear and is extremely irritating; Mot does provide some of the first ideas such as asking how he's doing; from there on the text is Chi's idea

u.a: SIS could you open that (cheese) and just cut him a small slice off please
can hear Bro and Sis in the background; Chi ignores all this and writes
Chi is writing while Sis and Bro are screaming in the background
can't hear because of all the screaming
BRO has taken the knife; Mot gets up , takes the knife away , and comes back to the chair behind Chi
tries to calm Bro down for 20 seconds
compliments Chi on letter I think
you have to wait one minute
not sure if this is being addressed to Bro or Chi
BRO is still crying in the background
can barely hear over the Bro screaming
